institutional_general_standards.listening: Can identify sounds of familiar words and basic phrases spoken slowly and clearly.
institutional_general_standards.reading: Can recognize familiar words in simple texts.
institutional_general_standards.speaking: Can use basic language and formulaic expressions to describe things and answer questions.
institutional_general_standards.writing: Can write about oneself using simple words.
institutional_general_standards.mediation: Can use mediation strategies such as gestures and body language to express basic ideas.
